Articles.Content: Just a question for the mods maybe... So now that we are all going to use Curse, should there be a Curse SubForum under KSP Network? or some form of forum at Curse for discussions around it? or we just post Curse Stuff in the Spaceport SubForum?

Actually and somewhere to provide feedback on Curse as Bob Mentioned in this weeks DevNotes.

eg. http://www.curse.com/plugins/kerbal has an "Are you an Author" Link on the right hand side to http://www.curseforge.com/curse-author-upload/kerbal which is a non existant page currently
Seeing as the old Spaceport is no longer being supported anyway, I'd not be surprised if this subforum here was turned into a Curse discussion forum.
The forum will be updated soon(Ã¢â€žÂ¢), but I'm not sure what the best way going forward with it is, there are a few options to consider.

Understood Peoples, thanks. I just have some feedback on using it that might be good to capture/feedback. If we are gonnna be using it would be good to get the best experience, but didn't want to pile it in to the general "is Curse Good or Evil" forum thread

Actually and somewhere to provide feedback on Curse as Bob Mentioned in this weeks DevNotes.

eg. http://www.curse.com/plugins/kerbal has an "Are you an Author" Link on the right hand side to http://www.curseforge.com/curse-author-upload/kerbal which is a non existant page currently

Fixed with a link to http://kerbal.curseforge.com/plugins/create instead. Thanks for the heads-up!

@MentalPower, since you're here, let me ask this:

When are you guys going to give the game the respect it deserves and spell out the name fully? At least make it KSP not Kerbal. I don't mind it in the url but it feels like the community is getting shafted by not giving us the full "Kerbal Space Program" spelled out.

@MentalPower, since you're here, let me ask this:

When are you guys going to give the game the respect it deserves and spell out the name fully? At least make it KSP not Kerbal. I don't mind it in the url but it feels like the community is getting shafted by not giving us the full "Kerbal Space Program" spelled out.

I only see the bare "Kerbal" on three places at http://kerbal.curseforge.com/. The URL as you mentioned, the page's title and the blurb about hosting your addon that's below the KSP logo. The URL is kinda hard to change at this point, although a redirect from ksp.curseforge.com could be setup. As for the other two places, they are both in space-sensitive areas. I think we can probably change them to "KSP" instead of "Kerbal" though, I'll ask around if this is something we can do on our end or if it requires SQUAD's approval.

Fixed with a link to http://kerbal.curseforge.com/plugins/create instead. Thanks for the heads-up!

No Probs, Thanks for fixing it.

My 2c - I think Capt Sierra is right and the name KSP is much more recognized than Kerbal. I'm sure its a Squad decision though

I only see the bare "Kerbal" on three places at http://kerbal.curseforge.com/. The URL as you mentioned, the page's title and the blurb about hosting your addon that's below the KSP logo. The URL is kinda hard to change at this point, although a redirect from ksp.curseforge.com could be setup. As for the other two places, they are both in space-sensitive areas. I think we can probably change them to "KSP" instead of "Kerbal" though, I'll ask around if this is something we can do on our end or if it requires SQUAD's approval.

I think you got that backwards. I fully understand about the URL and am fine with that. I think it's the proper thing to do to have the title blurb spell out Kerbal Space Program.

I think you got that backwards. I fully understand about the URL and am fine with that. I think it's the proper thing to do to have the title blurb spell out Kerbal Space Program.

I asked and it turns out this requires a deploy to fix, not something that we do over the weekend if we can avoid it. We also need to clear it with SQUAD, they approved all the copy that's there right now.
